synopsis.text:
What was once a peaceful vacation on the picturesque Koumi Island quickly turns into a thrilling treasure hunt for Conan Edogawa and his friends. The island, nestled in the Pacific Ocean, is renowned for its lush hills, vibrant coral reefs, and an intriguing legend. The legend speaks of the Seabed Palace, an ancient underwater ruin believed to house the treasure of the infamous female pirates, Anne Bonnie and Mary Reed, who lived 300 years ago.

The group, including the famous detective Kogorou Mouri, his daughter Ran, her best friend Sonoko Suzuki, and the Detective Boys, finds themselves amidst a group of suspicious treasure hunters. As they delve deeper into the island's mysteries, the friends are swept up in the local treasure fever.

While the Detective Boys embark on their own treasure hunt, Conan finds himself in murkier waters as he stumbles upon a murder case. As the island descends into chaos, with both locals and treasure hunters racing to find the legendary pirate booty, Conan, Kogorou, and the police focus on uncovering the truth behind the murder.

Amidst planned shark attacks, kidnappings, and deep-sea diving adventures, the quest for justice and the legendary treasure unfolds in this exciting escapade.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
